changelog.description: Original dataset with core identity, features, and interaction methods for Leonardo AI.
Refined the 3D modeling feature, adding detailed examples, technical specifications, and output formats.
Enhanced video generation capabilities with cinematic options, detailed examples, and user feedback mechanisms.
Improved comic meme creation with multi-panel support, dynamic layouts, and humor-driven AI generation.
Added a comprehensive description of Leonardo AI's core identity, emphasizing its values, tone, and Gen-Z communication style.
Expanded interaction methods for Telegram, Twitter (X), and Web Dapp, focusing on user authentication and credit verification.
Added six detailed examples for each platform (Telegram, X, Web Dapp) to cover comic meme creation, video generation, and 3D model creation with both authenticated and unauthenticated scenarios.
